column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Update: Getting dangerously close to being a novel instead of a review
column2: but I was floored by the customer service during my most recent visit. I came in ~2 PM with the intention of shoving one of their delicious mudslide cookies in my mouth
column3: but they hadn't put them out yet. An employee told me that when they get too slammed
column4: the timing of their baked goods gets thrown off. As I was enjoying my eclair
column5: the aforementioned employee stopped by to inform me that the cookies were ready! She brought me one and said I could skip the line and just pay at the bar. Excellent customer service. Â Amazing cookie
